metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12953 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Dropbear 2011.54 through 2018.76 has an inconsistent failure delay that may lead to revealing valid usernames, a different issue than CVE-2018-15599.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12953` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dropbear - 2019.78-2build1
dropbear-bin - 2019.78-2build1
dropbear-initramfs - 2019.78-2build1
dropbear-run - 2019.78-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dropbear package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2019.78-2build1').
